xc:Description.TranslatedText: Available for Protocol Version 02
On Pre-medication forms, automatic incremental number for each itemgroup.
On Pre-medication form for Cooling pads the Unit=Number of pads.
On Pre-medication form for Vasoconstrictor eye drops AND Steroid eye drops the Unit=Drops
On Pre-medication form when Cooling pads?=Yes then Pre-medication (Cooling pads) itemgroup is enabled.
On Pre-medication form when Vasoconstrictor eye drops?=Yes then Pre-medication (Vasoconstrictor eye drops) itemgroup is enabled.
On Pre-medication form when Steroid eye drops?=Yes then Pre-medication (Steroid eye drops) itemgroup is enabled.

xc:Message.TranslatedText: The stop date is before the start date. Please verify and correct where appropriate.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On Ocular pre-medication forms when Start date > End date then query: "The stop date is before the start date. Please verify and correct where appropriate."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: The stop time is before the start time. Please verify and correct where appropriate.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On Ocular pre-medication forms when Start time > End time then query: "The stop time is before the start time. Please verify and correct where appropriate."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: The medication is expected to be taken on the day of infusion. Please check the start date and correct or explain.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On Ocular pre-medication forms when Start date is not equal to Treatment administration date then query: "The medication is expected to be taken on the day of infusion. Please check the start date and correct or explain."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: The medication is expected to be taken on the day of infusion. Please check the stop date and correct or explain.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On Ocular pre-medication (cooling pads) forms when Stop date is not equal to Treatment administration date then query: "The medication is expected to be taken on the day of infusion. Please check the stop date and correct or explain."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: The medication is expected to be taken for 3 days from the day of infusion. Please check the stop date and correct or explain.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On Ocular pre-medication (steroid eye drops) forms when Stop date is not 2 days after Treatment administration date then query: "The medication is expected to be taken for 3 days from the day of infusion. Please check the stop date and correct or explain."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: The first application is expected to be before the start of the infusion. Please check the start time and correct or explain.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On Ocular pre-medication forms when Start time is not before Treatment administration time then query: "The first application is expected to be before the start of the infusion. Please check the start time and correct or explain." (for cooling-pads only first itemgroup)

xc:Message.TranslatedText: End time should not be before ocular pre-medication stop time. Please correct or clarify.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On Trial drug administration form when End time is before the last Stop time on Ocular Pre-medication form / Cooling pads then query: "End time should not be before ocular pre-medication stop time. Please correct or clarify."
On treatment details item group, automatic incremental number for each event recorded.
If "Therapy line" is NC, then disable treatment details and best response
If Treatment category 'SURGERY', then disable items 'Route'
If context of treatment is other, then display item 'Other'
If Treatment category is 'SYSTEMIC TREATMENT', then display Treatment name, 'Number of cycles'
Display Surgery if 'Treatment category' = 'Surgery''
Display 'If other please specify', if 'Treatment category' = 'SYSTEMIC TREATMENT'' and Treatment name is Other
If unit is other, then display 'Unit, other'
if Frequency is other, then display item 'Frequency, other'
if Route is other, then display item 'Route, other'
If start date is NK, then display start month and year
Display end month and year if 'Treatment category' = 'Systemic treatment ' or ' Radiotherapy' and 'Ongoing' = 'N' and End date = 'NK'
Display Progression month and year if 'Progression date id NK
Display 'if other please specify' if Stop reason if ongoing is 'No' and stop reason is Other
Enable Irradiation site if treatment is radiotherapy
If Treatment category 'SYSTEMIC TREATMENT' or 'RADIOTHERAPY', then enable items 'Dose', 'Frequency', Context of treatment', 'ongoing'
Display end date and stop reason if ongoing is No
If Treatment category 'SYSTEMIC TREATMENT' , then enable item 'Route'

xc:Condition.xc:Script: $contextNode<$i_cmstdat || ( yearOf($contextNode) < $i_cmstyr ) || ( yearOf($contextNode) == $i_cmstyr && monthOf($contextNode) < $i_cmstmo ) || ( $i_cmenyr < yearOf($i_cmstdat) ) || ( $i_cmenyr == yearOf($i_cmstdat) && $i_cmenmo < monthOf($i_cmstdat) ) || ( $i_cmenyr < $i_cmstyr ) || ( $i_cmenyr == $i_cmstyr && $i_cmenmo < $i_cmstmo )

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Start date should be before stop date. Please correct where appropriate.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On Concomitant Medication form (Event and on screening), if the end date (complete or partial) is before the start date (complete or partial , then query posted on stop date: "Medication end date is before medication start date. Please verify and update where applicable."
On vital signs, calculate the timepoints item.

xc:Parameter.xc:Script: choose (when isValue($weight) && isValue($height) then $weight/(($height/100)*($height/100)) otherwise toAlternateResponseCode("NA"))

xc:Description.TranslatedText: At every visit, calculate the BMI value based on the weight and baseline height
Disabled height on all visits but screening
Disable timepoint item on screening visit
Disable 'Weight, height, BMI' on all visits except screening

xc:Message.TranslatedText: VS should be done within 30 minutes before study drug administration. Please clarify.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: If timepoint is 'Before infusion within 30 minutes before' and time of sample is > 30 min before start time of treatment administration, then display query : "VS should be done within 30 minutes before study drug administration. Please clarify."
On vs item group, automatic incremental number for each event recorded.
When collection time is ND, then disable all next items
Disable 'Weight taken on' : on screening visit
If weight not done, then disable item "Weight taken on:"
If temperature is ND, the disable location
If SBP and DBP and HR are ND are ND, the disable position
If collection date on VS is ND, then enable reason item
If collection date on VS is filled in with a date, then enable next item groups

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Systolic blood pressure is outside normal ranges. Please check the value entered or confirm. If confirmed, please verify if this event should be reported as an MH/AE.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On vital signs form at each visit, if systolic blood pressure is not between 90 mmHg and 200 mmHg then query posted on result: "Systolic blood pressure is outside normal ranges. Please check the value entered or confirm. If confirmed, please verify if this event should be reported as an MH/AE.."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Diastolic blood pressure is outside normal ranges. Please check the value entered or confirm. If confirmed, please verify if this event should be reported as an MH/AE.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On vital signs form at each visit, if diastolic blood pressure is not between 50 mmHg and 100 mmHg then query posted on result: "Diastolic blood pressure is outside normal ranges. Please check the value entered or confirm. If confirmed, please verify if this event should be reported as an MH/AE."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Heart rate is outside normal ranges. Please check the value entered or confirm. If confirmed, please verify if this event should be reported as an MH/AE.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On vital signs form at each visit, if heart rate is not between 50 beats/min and 120 beats/min then query posted on result: "Heart rate is outside normal ranges. Please check the value entered or confirm. If confirmed, please verify if this event should be reported as an MH/AE."
At Screening visit on VS form only 1 itemgroup of assessments.

xc:Message.TranslatedText: VS should be done 30 minutes after study drug administration. Please clarify.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: If timepoint is 'After infusion within 30 minutes after' and time of sample is more than 30 min after end time of treatment administration, then display query : "VS should be done 30 minutes after study drug administration. Please clarify."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Diastolic blood pressure should be lower than Systolic blood pressure. Please correct.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On VS forms when Diastolic blood pressure is higher than Systolic blood pressure then query: "Diastolic blood pressure should be lower than Systolic blood pressure. Please correct."
If 'Assessment date ' is not done (NC) on Cancer status at screening, then disable all next TNM and stage items
If 'Was a tumor staging performed at first diagnosis?' is 'No', then disable all next TNM and stage items
if "Was a tumor staging performed at first diagnosis?" is NC, then disable cancer status at screening
Enable Tumor Classification T, M and stage (i.chstgTth) if Type of cancer is NSCLC (On screening visit 1 and 2)
Enable Tumor Classification T (i.chstgTth) if Type of cancer' = 'HC RTHLE CELLTHYROID CANCER' or 'PAPILLARY THYROID CANCER ' or 'MEDULLARY THYROID CANCER'
If 'Date of diagnosis' is NK, then display partial month and year.
If 'Was a tumor staging performed at first diagnosis?' is 'N' then display item 'Specify reason'
Enable Tumor Classification T (i.chstgitu) and tumor stage (i.chstgian) if Type of cancer' = 'ANAPLASTIC'
Enable Tumor Classification T (i.chstgTov) and tumor stage (i.chstgiov) if Type of cancer' = 'OVARIAN'
Enable Tumor Classification T (i.chstgTce) and tumor stage (i.chstgice) if Type of cancer' = 'CERVICAL'
Enable Tumor Classification T (i.chstgTen)and tumor stage (i.chstgien) if Type of cancer' = 'ENDOMETRIAL'
Enable Tumor Classification N (i.chstgTen) and M (i.chstgMth) if Type of cancer' = 'HC RTHLE CELLTHYROID CANCER' or 'PAPILLARY THYROID CANCER ' or 'MEDULLARY THYROID CANCER' or 'ANAPLASTIC'
Enable Tumor Classification N (i.chstgTov) if Type of cancer' ='OVARIAN CANCER' or 'CERVICAL CANCER'
Enable Tumor Classification N (i.chstgTen) if Type of cancer' ='OVARIAN', 'CERVICAL' or 'ENDOMETRIAL'
Enable Tumor stage (i.chstgith) if Type of cancer' =''HC RTHLE CELLTHYROID CANCER''
Enable Tumor stage (i.chstgitp) if Type of cancer' =''PAPILLARY' and age < 45
Enable Tumor stage (i.chstgita) if Type of cancer' =''PAPILLARY' and age >= 45
Enable Tumor stage (i.chstgitb) if Type of cancer' ='MEDULLARY THYROID CANCER'
Enable Tumor Classification N if Type of cancer is NSCLC or MELANOMA
Enable Tumor Classification T and M(i.chstgTme - i.chstgMme) and tumor stage (i.chstgime) and location if Type of cancer' = 'MELANOMA'
On Cancer History form when Type of cancer = MELANOMA and Location=Other then Please specify is enabled.

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Date of first diagnosis is before date of Birth. Please correct where appropriate.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: If date of diagnosis (complete or partial) is before the DOB on screening visit (complete or partial), then query posted : "Date of first diagnosis is before date of Birth. Please correct where appropriate."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Date of first diagnosis is after date of Informed Consent. Please correct where appropriate.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: If date of diagnosis (complete or partial) is after ICF on screening visit, then query posted : "Date of first diagnosis is after date of Informed Consent. Please correct where appropriate."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Date of first diagnosis is after start date of previous cancer treatment. Please correct where appropriate.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: If date of diagnosis (complete or partial) is after start of previous cancer treatment (complete or partial), then query posted : "Date of first diagnosis is after start date of previous cancer treatment. Please correct where appropriate.
Visit Patient Follow-up is disabled.
If 'Did the patient complete the safety follow-up?' is No, then display "Reason for not attending Safety Follow-up"
If 'Reason for withdrawal' is 'DISEASE PROGRESSION', then display items 'What was the date of progression?' and "Which progression criteria were fulfilled?"
if 'Reason for withdrawal' is 'AE', then display 'AE Number(s)''
if 'Reason for withdrawal' is 'AE', then display 'AE Number(s)''
if 'Reason for withdrawal' is 'Other', then display 'Specify'
if 'Reason for withdrawal' is 'Other', then display 'Specify'
if 'Reason for withdrawal' is 'Death', then display 'What was the date of the death?' and 'What was the primary cause of death?'
Display 'Date of last participation in follow-up period' and 'Reason for not attending Safety Follow-up' if 'Did the patient complete the follow-up?*' is No
If 'Reason for withdrawal' is 'PROGRESSIVE DISSEASE', then display items 'What was the date of progression?' and "Which progression criteria were fulfilled?"
Display the patient follow up visit if 'Will the patient continue in follow-up?' is Yes

xc:Message.TranslatedText: AE is not related to study drug and start date is later than the safety follow-up visit date. Please verify and update where applicable.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On Adverse event form, if AE start date is after safety follow up date and AE not related to study treatment then query posted on start date: "AE is not related to study drug and start date is later than the safety follow-up visit date. Please verify and update where applicable."
Display the safety follow up visit if 'Will the Patient Continue in safety follow-up?' is Yes

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Please fill in end of trial page.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: If 'Will the patient continue in follow-up?', or 'Did the patient complete the follow up visit' is No, then display message 'Please fill in end of trial page.'

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Safety Follow Up visit should be performed 30 days(+-14) after date of last study drug administration. Please clarify.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: If the date of Safety Follow Up is not done 30 days (+-14 days) after last study drug administration, then query posted : "Safety Follow Up visit should be performed 30 days (+-14) after date of last study drug administration. Please clarify."
On Alcohol habits, if Does the patient drink alcohol? is Yes then display Frequency
if 'Is the patient:' is 'Current smoker' or 'Past smoker', then display Start month and start year
if 'Is the patient:' is 'Current smoker' or 'Past smoker' and start year == NK then display 'Started more than 10 year ago?'
if 'Is the patient:' is 'Past smoker', then display Stop month and stop year
if 'Is the patient:' is 'Past smoker' and stop year == NK and "Started more than 10 years ago" is not "N" then display 'Stopped more than 10 year ago?'
If 'Started more than 10 years ago is 'No' and "Started more than 10 years ago" is "N" , then display 'Stopped more than 2 years ago?'

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Start year is before or equal to year of birth. Please review and correct.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: In Substance use form, if the substance use start year is before the year of birth then query posted :"Start year is before or equal to year of birth. Please review and correct."

xc:Message.TranslatedText: Stop year must be after or equal to the start year. Please review and correct.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: In Substance use form, if the substance use stop year is before the start year then query: "Stop year must be after or equal to the start year. Please review and correct."
If 'Did the patient fail screening?' is 'Yes' and 'Reason for screen failure' is 'ELIGIBILIY CRITERIA', then display item group 'Protocol Version'
Display item group Inclusion/Exclusion criteria if Protocol Version is filled in
On Inclusion/Exclusion criteria not met item group, automatic incremental number for each criteria added.
If protocol is 1 then disable i.ietestc2 (second What is the identifier(s) of the criterion/criteria not met? item) if patient is scrennfailed due to eligibility criteria.
If protocol is 2 or upper then disable i.ietestcd (first What is the identifier(s) of the criterion/criteria not met? item) if patient is scrennfailed due to eligibility criteria.

xc:Message.TranslatedText: The informed consent form version date is after the date the patient signed informed consent ?

xc:Description.TranslatedText: On Patient Identification form when Informed consent form version date > What was the date the patient signed informed consent ? then query: "The informed consent form version date is after the date the patient signed informed consent ?"

xc:Message.TranslatedText: This is an incorrect entry. The screening number should start with a S followed by 3 digits.

xc:Description.TranslatedText: Screening number must start with a S followed by 3 digits. If not the case, display veto message : 'This is an incorrect entry. The screening number should start with a S followed by 3 digits.'
To calculate the country code

SignatureDef.LegalReason: Please review the data and make sure that all of the information provided is complete and accurate.
